admin.backups.title: Backups & Restoration
admin.backups.subtitle: Manage your backups and restore your data when needed
admin.backups.retentionPolicy.title: Retention policy
admin.backups.retentionPolicy.descriptio: Standard backups are retained for 30 days. Financial data (payments, invoices, subscriptions) is retained indefinitely for legal compliance (10 years minimum).
admin.backups.schedule.title: Backup schedule
admin.backups.schedule.rpo: RPO (Recovery Point Objective): 8 hours maximum data loss in case of incident.
admin.backups.byDate.title: Backups by date

admin.backups.restore.warnings.title: Warning
admin.backups.restore.irreversibleAction: Restoration may overwrite current data. Make sure you have a recent backup before continuing.
admin.backups.confirmation.title: Security confirmation
admin.backups.confirmation.warning: This action will restore data from a backup. A security backup will be created automatically before the restoration to allow you to rollback if needed.
admin.backups.confirmation.typeCode: To confirm, type the following code:
admin.backups.alerts.restoreProgress: The operation may take several minutes. Check the History tab to track progress.
admin.backups.alerts.deleteConfirm: Delete this backup? This action is irreversible.

admin.helpCenter.noArticles: No articles in this locale/category yet.
admin.helpCenter.autoTranslationCategory: Enter the category name in any language. The system will automatically detect the language and translate it to all 9 supported languages when you save.
admin.helpCenter.autoTranslationArticleD: Enter your article content in any language. The system will automatically detect the language and translate it to all 9 supported languages when you save.

admin.helpCenter.titlePlaceholder: Enter article title in any language...
admin.helpCenter.excerptPlaceholder: Enter article excerpt in any language...
admin.helpCenter.contentPlaceholder: Enter article content in any language (markdown supported)...
admin.helpCenter.tagsDescription: Tags will be translated to all languages automatically
admin.helpCenter.categoriesDescription: This script will create the following categories, all translated into 9 languages (FR, EN, ES, DE, PT, RU, HI, AR, CH):
admin.helpCenter.categoriesList.main: 5 main categories: Expatriate Clients, Lawyer Providers, Expat Helper Providers, Understanding SOS-Expat, Guides by Situation
admin.helpCenter.categoriesList.clients: 5 Client subcategories: Emergencies, Payments, My Account, Reviews, Security
admin.helpCenter.categoriesList.lawyers: 5 Lawyer subcategories: Joining, Missions, Payments, Performance, Ethics
admin.helpCenter.categoriesList.expats: 4 Expat Helper subcategories: Becoming, Interventions, Payments, Developing
admin.helpCenter.categoriesList.understa: 4 Understanding subcategories: Introduction, FAQ, Contact, Legal
admin.helpCenter.categoriesNote: Note: Existing categories will not be duplicated (verified by French slug).
admin.helpCenter.faqDescription: These FAQs were automatically generated and are displayed with Schema.org FAQPage for SEO.
admin.helpCenter.noFaqs: No FAQ generated for this article.
admin.helpCenter.faqAutoGenerated: FAQs are automatically generated when creating/editing the article.
admin.helpCenter.articlesDescription: Articles will be automatically translated into 9 languages (FR, EN, ES, DE, PT, RU, HI, AR, CH) via free API.
admin.helpCenter.categoriesFoundReady: {count} categories found. Ready for article initialization.
admin.helpCenter.initCategoriesFirst: Click "Init 25 categories" first to create all categories.
admin.helpCenter.timeWarning: Note: Initialization may take 15-30 minutes due to API translations. Do not close this window during the process.
admin.helpCenter.doNotClose: Do not close this window. Each article is being translated into 9 languages via free API.
admin.helpCenter.resetDescription: This action will delete ALL categories ({categories}) and ALL articles ({articles}) from the Help Center.
admin.helpCenter.resetStep1: Click "Init 25 categories" to recreate the structure
admin.helpCenter.resetStep2: Click "Init 119 articles" to create all articles
admin.helpCenter.deleteConfirm: This category has articles. Delete anyway?

admin.helpCenter.alertFillFields: Please fill in title, excerpt, and content.
admin.helpCenter.alertSaveCategoryError: Error saving category. Please try again.
